entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Blind River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or snow. High 6 with temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle changing to flurries this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 70 late this afternoon. High 6 with temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
